descEN:
Remove dead skin cells, excess sebum and other impurities, help the nutrients to the lower layers of skin. Focusing on acne scar removal, decolorize pigments and other skin problems. Stimulate blood circulation, reduce redness. To make your skin firming, soft, smooth and Healthy.


Redemption:
Present the in-app coupon to enjoy the discount offer


Redemption Centre Location Map:
Causeway Bay: Unit 703, 7/F, Cameron Commercial Centre, 458-468 Hennessy Road, Causeway Bay, HK. (MTR Exit B)
Tsim Sha Tsui: Unit 301, 3/F., Cheong Hing Bldg., 72 Nathan Road, Tsim Sha Tsui, KLN. (MTR Exit A2)
Mong Kok: Unit 1402, 14/F., Argyle Centre, Phase 1, 688 Nathan Road., Mong Kok, KLN. (MTR Exit D2)


For details:
http://www.maggiebeauty.com


Enquiries: 
T: +852-9739-5828
E: Info@maggiebeauty.com


Terms and Conditions:
• This coupon is valid until December 31, 2017.
• Valid for new male and female customers or existing customers who have finished all treatment courses at least 6 months.
• Call to book minimum 3 days in advance with the voucher.
• Any request of modification or cancellation of appointment, must be informed with minimum 6 hours ahead, and can only be changed once.
• Please check with merchant for the opening hours of the public holiday.
• Booked session will be counted as used for absentees.
• For latecomers, booked session may be relatively shortened.
• Limited 1 person per booking.
• Limit 1 voucher of same treatment per person.
descZhHK:
透過去除過厚角質層, 令養份滲透皮膚深層，重點消除暗瘡印、疤痕、色素沉澱等皮膚問題。能激活皮膚自生功能，刺激血液循環，回復彈性、抗黑色素、平衡膚色，令皮膚光滑、嫩白及細膩。


換取方法:
只需出示您電子錢包內的優惠券，即可享受以上優惠


換取中心:
銅鑼灣: 軒尼詩道458-468號金聯商業中心7樓703室 (近港鐵站B出口)
尖沙咀: 彌敦道72號昌興大廈3樓301室 (近港鐵站A2出口)
旺角: 彌敦道688號旺角中心一期1402室 (近港鐵站D2出口)


細節:
http://www.maggiebeauty.com


查詢:
電話:+852-9739-5828
電子郵件:Info@maggiebeauty.com


條款及細則:
• 此優惠券的有效日期為即日至2017年12月31日。
• 適用於男女性新客戶 及在過去6個月已完成所有在本公司療程的舊有客戶
• 最少3日前致電預約並提供優惠券編號
• 6小時前可更改或取消預約，只限 1 次
• 請向商戶查詢節日/特別日子之營業時間
• 缺席者，該次預約療程當已使用論
• 遲到者，療程時間將相對縮短
• 每次只接受1位客人預約
• 每人限使用購買一次同類療程優惠券
descZhCN:
透过去除过厚角质层, 令养份渗透皮肤深层，重点消除暗疮印丶疤痕丶色素沉淀等皮肤问题。能激活皮肤自生功能，刺激血液循环，回复弹性丶抗黑色素丶平衡肤色，令皮肤光滑丶嫩白及细腻。


换取方法:
只需出示您电子钱包内的优惠券，即可享受以上优惠


换取中心:
铜锣湾: 轩尼诗道458-468号金联商业中心7楼703室 (近港铁站B出口)
尖沙咀: 弥敦道72号昌兴大厦3楼301室 (近港铁站A2出口)
旺角: 弥敦道688号旺角中心一期1402室 (近港铁站D2出口)


细节:
http://www.maggiebeauty.com


查询:
电话:+852-9739-5828
电子邮件:Info@maggiebeauty.com


条款及细则:
• 此优惠券的有效日期为即日至2017年12月31日。
• 适用於男女性新客户 及在过去6个月已完成所有在本公司疗程的旧有客户
• 最少3日前致电预约并提供优惠券编号
• 6小时前可更改或取消预约，只限 1 次
• 请向商户查询节日/特别日子之营业时间
• 缺席者，该次预约疗程当已使用论
• 迟到者，疗程时间将相对缩短
• 每次只接受1位客人预约
• 每人限使用购买一次同类疗程优惠券
termsEN:
For usage of the coupon through TNG, our standard terms and conditions apply. In particular:
(a) Participating Ticketing Merchants will be responsible for providing the related goods/services;
(b) No refund will be offered by TNG for any unused ticket, voucher or coupon upon expiry;
(c) TNG does not warrant or guarantee the quality, merchantability or fitness for purpose, of goods/services sold/offered by Participating Ticketing Merchants; and
(d) These tickets, vouchers and coupons are only valid upon presentation through our TNG app by the owner of the device housing the TNG app.
